## TreeNode class

A TreeNode is a basic unit to construct a leaf in a tree. The instantiation of [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md) is usually done through [Tree.createTree()](./treex.js.tree.createtree.md) or some methods with [NodeProp](./treex.js.nodeprop.md)<!-- -->. It provides fluent APIs and support a type parameter for data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TreeNode<T> implements ManipulationNode<T> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ManipulationNode](./treex.js.manipulationnode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

It rarely happen to instantiate a instance of it on your own.

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_prop, \_parent, resource)](./treex.js.treenode._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>TreeNode</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./treex.js.treenode.children.md) |  | ReadonlyArray&lt;[TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A child list. |
|  [data](./treex.js.treenode.data.md) |  | T | A data this node contains. |
|  [height](./treex.js.treenode.height.md) |  | number | A height of a tree. |
|  [parent](./treex.js.treenode.parent.md) |  | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; \| "tree" \| undefined | If this node is a root, the parent property must be "tree". If this node a node which is not a root and in a tree, it must be a existing node. Otherwise, it must be undefined and this node isn't belonging to a tree. |
|  [path](./treex.js.treenode.path.md) |  | string | A string representation of this node's location. |
|  [prop](./treex.js.treenode.prop.md) |  | [NodeProp](./treex.js.nodeprop.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A initial data which was provided when a node was created. |
|  [selected](./treex.js.treenode.selected.md) |  | boolean | Whether it is selected. |
|  [selectedNodes](./treex.js.treenode.selectednodes.md) |  | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;\[\] | A list of selected nodes. |
|  [visibility](./treex.js.treenode.visibility.md) |  | boolean | Whether it is visible. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [appendAfter(prop)](./treex.js.treenode.appendafter.md) |  | It usually append a node successfully, but it isn't possible to append a node next to root node. |
|  [appendBefore(prop)](./treex.js.treenode.appendbefore.md) |  | It usually append a node successfully, but it isn't possible to append a node in front of root node. |
|  [appendChild(prop)](./treex.js.treenode.appendchild.md) |  |  |
|  [bfs(predicate, stopWhenFound)](./treex.js.treenode.bfs.md) |  | Initially, it was deisgned to traverse a tree. And two parameters were added newly to satisfy requirements without a performance loss. It was required to remove some nodes from a result and stop it when the predicate returns true during traversing the tree. |
|  [contains(node)](./treex.js.treenode.contains.md) |  | It lets us know whether a node exists in a tree. |
|  [deselect()](./treex.js.treenode.deselect.md) |  | Deselect this node. |
|  [find(predicate)](./treex.js.treenode.find.md) |  | It tries to visit every node and apply a predicate to each node. When a result value of executing the predicate with a node is true, It stops visiting and return that node. |
|  [getNodes()](./treex.js.treenode.getnodes.md) |  |  |
|  [getNodes(level)](./treex.js.treenode.getnodes_1.md) |  |  |
|  [getNodes(strategy)](./treex.js.treenode.getnodes_2.md) |  |  |
|  [onChildChanged()](./treex.js.treenode.onchildchanged.md) |  |  |
|  [onRemoved()](./treex.js.treenode.onremoved.md) |  | When a node is removed in a tree it belongs to, it resolve a promise. |
|  [onSelectionChange()](./treex.js.treenode.onselectionchange.md) |  | It's a event listener on changes of selection status. |
|  [onUpdated()](./treex.js.treenode.onupdated.md) |  | It's a event listener on changes of data. |
|  [onVisibilityChange()](./treex.js.treenode.onvisibilitychange.md) |  | It's a event listener on changes of visibility status. |
|  [remove()](./treex.js.treenode.remove.md) |  | Remove itself in a tree it belong to. |
|  [removeAllChildren()](./treex.js.treenode.removeallchildren.md) |  | Clean up a child list. |
|  [removeChild(node)](./treex.js.treenode.removechild.md) |  | Remove a child node. |
|  [select()](./treex.js.treenode.select.md) |  | Select this node. |
|  [setVisibility(visibility)](./treex.js.treenode.setvisibility.md) |  | Set the visibility of this node. |
